Name: Heaven & Hell
About the game: In the devilish match-3 game Heaven & Hell, you'll have to help the witty angel Angelo bring back the heavenly artifacts stolen by the devil. But it won't be easy! Make your way through the subdivisions of hell and solve great match3 levels and other puzzles to regain possession of the scattered artifacts. Play over 200 thrilling match3 levels full of humorously hand drawn graphics! Use several unique bonuses, choose out of three different game modes and unlock great achievements. Visit the 6 different worlds and play 3 different game modes Play over 200 thrilling levels and win great bonuses Unlock loads of achievements Enjoy the hand drawn graphics Lots of humor and fun for all Ages Also play the second part soon on Steam ... /
